name: Neon Tetra
description: The Neon Tetra is a popular choice among aquarists for its vibrant colors and peaceful nature. It is a small freshwater fish native to South America.

name: Betta Fish
description: Also known as Siamese Fighting Fish, Bettas are known for their vibrant colors and flowing fins. They require warm water and are known for their territorial behavior.

name: Angelfish
description: Angelfish are graceful freshwater fish with elongated fins and striking color patterns. They are popular choices for community tanks but may display aggression during breeding.

name: Guppy
description: Guppies are small, colorful fish that are easy to care for and breed. They are known for their vibrant colors and adaptability to various tank conditions.

name: Discus Fish
description: Discus fish are known for their vibrant colors and distinctive disc-shaped bodies. They require pristine water conditions and are popular choices for advanced aquarists.

name: Zebra Danio
description: Zebra Danios are small, active fish with distinctive zebra-like stripes. They are hardy and can tolerate a wide range of water conditions, making them suitable for beginner aquarists.

name: Molly
description: Mollies are peaceful, live-bearing fish available in various colors and patterns. They are easy to care for and are suitable for community tanks.

name: Corydoras Catfish
description: Corydoras Catfish are bottom-dwelling fish known for their playful behavior and armored appearance. They are excellent scavengers and help keep the aquarium clean.

name: Koi Fish
description: Koi Fish are large, ornamental carp known for their stunning colors and patterns. They are often kept in outdoor ponds but can also thrive in large aquariums.

name: Clown fish
description: Clown fish, also known as Anemonefish, are small, colorful fish found in coral reefs. They have a symbiotic relationship with sea anemones and are popularized by the movie 'Finding Nemo.'
